statements: UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET product_name='Laptop', price=1200.50, inventory_count=10 WHERE id=1
UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET category='Electronics', last_stocked='2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE id=2

UPDATE pro_shop_inventory
SET price = 19.99,
    inventory_count = inventory_count + 5,
    last_stocked = '2022-07-15 09:00:00'
WHERE id = 101;

UPDATE pro_shop_inventory
SET product_name = 'Organic Green Tea',
    category = 'Beverages',
    price = 12.50,
    inventory_count = 50
WHERE id = 202;
UPDATE pro_shop_sales SET quantity = 10 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET restock_level = 20, quantity_in_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE pro_shop_sales SET quantity = 10, sale_date = '2021-10-20' WHERE sale_id = 100;
UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 5, restock_level = 20 WHERE product_id = 200;
UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET price = 10.99 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_tracking SET quantity_sold = 5, total_price = 54.75 WHERE sale_id = 10;
UPDATE pro_shop_inventory SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE sales_tracking SET total_price = quantity_sold * total_price WHERE sale_id = 98765;
UPDATE Sales SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Restocking SET quantity = 50, supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = 100, price = 5000.00 WHERE product_name = 'Golf Club' AND sale_date = '2022-09-01';
UPDATE Restocking SET quantity = 50, restock_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE supplier_name = 'Best Suppliers' AND product_name = 'Tennis Balls';
UPDATE golf_course SET course_length = 7000, number_of_holes = 18 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE product SET price = 24.99, quantity_in_stock = 50 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE golf_course SET course_length = 7000, number_of_holes = 18 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE product SET price = 29.99, quantity_in_stock = 1000 WHERE id = 5;
